author: Lobo_da_boss_
title: My only mixel
review:
Opening;

This my only mixel and I really appreciate the cartoony design and effort put in to make him unique .

The build-

Starting with the head the is a 2×2 trans white dome over his single eye and a black fin on his head and below he has his sharp teeth , wing arms and torso which is all greatly built . The torso has a very nice tiled front and towards the back there is a clip with the standard Lego flame coming out to represent her propulsion . His legs like the arms are attached via some mini ball joints and the feet are nicely sloped and have a 1×2 pearl gold grill tile on the front of each foot  for extra detail .

In conclusion-

mixels wasn't a theme for me but I do appreciate the amount of effort put in to make each character unique I am glad to own this and would recommend it to any fans of weird and cartoony Lego figs and builds .

author: StevenTheBrick
title: Niksput
review:
4/5

Great building experience as it's an interesting Mixel due to the Space theme. Good parts such as the dome piece, plane piece, and variety of colors. Ok playability from the limb movements, mouth, and fire tail. Good value also as it's a Mixel that looks good. Gives Transformers vibes.
